oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Handwritten copy of the diary of Pvt. Rodyson Roberson Etter, Co.. H, 16th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This copy of the soldier's diary was made by his grand daugther Henrietta Pummill. The grand daughter copied his original diary by hand. Pvt. Etter was wounded in the shoulder blades at Perryville, Ky. In Oct. 1862.
